lines.text:
[drunk]
I'm all wet!
I think your sweetheart's been taking too many diet pills.
What's wrong?
My... burger's... weird.
Let's BUZZZZZ!
You know what you look like?

[laughs]
What?
A big chicken!
Shmerack! Shmerack!
[Sheila flaps her open bra]
Oh come on, baby. Light my fire!
You bet I will.
[lights the killer on fire with a blowtorch]
I can't get no... satisfaction!
Do they always make that much noise?
The more they do it the louder they get. Practice makes perfect.

[to Courtney]
I am you, and you are me, until we go all the way.
My face it turning into one big pimple!
Sally, I don't see a thing.
You may not see it but its there. There's one, its just lurking below the surface.
[Courtney is having a hallucination whilst talking to Sally]

The weirdest things are happening to my face! I've got the fastest growing zit I have ever had in my entire life! I mean, look at this thing! Isn't this the grossest thing you've ever seen? I need to get some more "Oxy 10". It hurts like hell.
[Suddenly, Sally's zit starts growing to a grotesquely monstrous size until her face explodes in an eruption of goo]
[Courtney is panicking over a horrific vision]
I'm gonna go call the cops.
Ohh, God. Anybody got any tranqs?
Damn kids!
Sheila, be careful... Who knows who's out there.
what were you looking at?
A dead bird
YEEEECH... you are so weird sometimes.
Your dream,no your a dream.

[picking up dead boyfriend's arm and splatting it on the birthday cake]
DOES THIS LOOK LIKE A DREAM TO YOU? DOES IT!

[while chasing after Courtney]
Courtney, here I come.

[after Courtney, half-drowned, is helped out of the swimming pool]
. How's your headache?
